item.title: 奇货可居：为什么真正的关税之痛尚未开始（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：为什么真正的关税之痛尚未开始（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Why the Real Tariff Pain Hasn’t Even Begun (Podcast)】

item.title: 财富外流加剧，身价 90 亿美元的英国兄弟退出英国
item.description: 英国最富有的两位房地产投资者放弃了英国作为他们的祖国，这是英国富裕居民因国家增税而离开英国的最新案例。【原文：Two of Britain’s richest real estate investors have ditched the UK as their home territory, the latest departures among the country’s elite as the nation hits wealthy residents with tax hikes.】

item.title: 金田公司加纳达芒矿延期一年
item.description: 金田有限公司（Gold Fields Ltd.）表示，将获得为期 12 个月的租约，以继续经营加纳的达芒矿，此前政府最初拒绝了该公司延长经营权的申请。【原文：Gold Fields Ltd. said it will be given a 12-month lease to continue operating the Damang mine in Ghana, after the government initially rejected its application to extend the rights.】

item.title: 朱庇特资产在关税战动荡中缩水 23 亿英镑
item.description: 在关税战引发的市场动荡中，朱庇特基金管理公司（Jupiter Fund Management Plc）的资产缩水超过 20 亿英镑（27 亿美元）。【原文：Jupiter Fund Management Plc’s assets have shrunk by more than £2 billion ($2.7 billion) amid the market upheaval triggered by the tariff war.】

item.title: 中国人民银行潘基文警告贸易摩擦威胁对世界经济的信任
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发出缓和紧张局势的信号之际，中国央行行长潘功胜在美国之行中敦促各国帮助维护对全球经济体系的信心，并重申中国反对加征关税。【原文：China’s central bank chief Pan Gongsheng urged countries to help maintain confidence in the global economic system on a trip to the US, reiterating Chinese opposition to tariffs as American President Donald Trump signals a shift toward de-escalating tensions.】

item.title: Cellnex 首席执行官预计年底前完成全面改革，着眼于英国市场的增长
item.description: Cellnex Telecom SA 首席执行官表示，公司出售资产的全面改革将在今年年底前基本完成，公司可能会在英国、荷兰和西班牙等市场寻求更多增长。【原文：Cellnex Telecom SA’s chief executive officer said a sweeping overhaul where the company sold off assets will be largely complete by the end of this year, and that the company could look to markets including the UK, the Netherlands and Spain for more growth.】

item.title: 美元下滑为企业盈利亮起红灯
item.description: 关税上涨和美元走软给本财报季公司的利润指引蒙上了阴影，未来几个季度还会出现更多的损害。【原文：Rising tariffs and the weakening dollar are casting a shadow on companies’ profit guidance this earnings season, with more damage seen unfolding over the coming quarters.】

item.title: 融创敦促债权人支持拟议的债务交换计划
item.description: 融创中国控股有限公司的财务顾问告诉债权人，这家中国开发商预计将在 2025 年底或明年初完成重组，并敦促债权人接受其所谓的 "唯一可行 "计划。【原文：Sunac China Holdings Ltd.’s financial adviser told creditors that the Chinese developer expects to complete its restructuring by the end of 2025 or early next year and urged them to get on board with what it called “the only viable” plan.】

item.title: 耗资 90 亿美元的米高梅赌场项目在日本破土动工
item.description: 在日本首次提出赌博度假村的建议四分之一个世纪后，官员们终于破土动工，建造可能成为亚洲收入最高的赌场。【原文：A quarter-century after gambling resorts were first proposed in Japan, officials finally broke ground on construction of what could become Asia’s highest-grossing casino.】

item.title: Databricks 将在印度招聘数百人，加速人工智能的蓬勃发展
item.description: Databricks Inc.将在未来三年内增加在印度的招聘，并投资超过 2.5 亿美元，以加速人工智能创新，加入大量在印度扩张的西方科技和人工智能公司的行列。【原文：Databricks Inc. will boost hiring and invest more than $250 million in India over the next three years to accelerate artificial intelligence innovation, joining a flood of Western tech and AI companies expanding in the country.】

item.title: 掉期交易表明外国人押注日本长期收益率反弹
item.description: 掉期市场的一项措施表明，外国投资者对日本超长期债券收益率将再次走高的预期越来越强烈。【原文：A swap market measure is signaling growing expectations among foreign investors that Japan’s super-long bond yields will head higher again.】

item.title: 野村称中国廉价商品可能对亚洲造成严重破坏
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc）的分析显示，中国廉价商品的突然流入可能会对新兴经济体，尤其是亚洲新兴经济体造成 "极大的破坏"，引发更大的贸易失衡、更强的通货紧缩和更多的财政支出。【原文：A sudden inflow of cheap Chinese goods may prove “very disruptive” to emerging economies, particularly in Asia, triggering bigger trade imbalances, stronger disinflation and greater fiscal spending, according to an analysis by Nomura Holdings Inc.】

item.title: 关税战愈演愈烈，中国企业匆忙宣布回购
item.description: 中国本月宣布的回购计划创下了自2024年2月股市暴跌以来的最高纪录，这表明企业正在齐心协力抵消美国关税对市场的影响。【原文：Buyback plans announced in China this month have reached the most since a stock rout in February 2024, a sign that companies are putting in concerted effort to offset the market impact from US tariffs.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市连胜岌岌可危，英镑仍低于 1.33 美元
受非洲销售增长的推动，橙色手机销售额略有增长
item.description: Orange SA 公布的第一季度销售额略有上升，原因是该公司中东和非洲业务的增长有助于缓解其法国和欧洲主要业务的激烈价格战。【原文：Orange SA reported first-quarter sales that rose slightly as growth in the company’s Middle East and African business helped mitigate the intense price wars in its key French and European businesses.】

item.title: 得益于黄金大涨，瑞士国家银行公布第一季度盈利报告
item.description: 瑞士国家银行的黄金持有量使该央行报告了第一季度的利润，这是在近期法郎飙升打击其收益之前的一个喘息机会。【原文：The Swiss National Bank’s gold holdings allowed the central bank to report a first-quarter profit, a respite before a recent surge in the franc hits its earnings.】

item.title: 诺基亚称在关税影响下达到指导上限 "具有挑战性
item.description: 诺基亚公司（Nokia Oyj）表示，由于该公司正在努力应对关税的影响，要实现今年的最高指导目标将更具挑战性。【原文：Nokia Oyj said that meeting the top end of its guidance for the year will be more challenging as the company grapples with the impact of tariffs.】

item.title: 罗氏第一季度销售额增长，管道成为焦点
item.description: 罗氏控股公司（Roche Holding AG）表示，在投资者等待有助于决定这家瑞士制药商未来增长的研究结果之际，该公司第一季度的销售额有所增长。【原文：Roche Holding AG said sales advanced in the first quarter as investors wait for study results that will help determine the Swiss drugmaker’s future growth.】

item.title: 雀巢销售额因咖啡和可可产品价格上涨而攀升
item.description: 雀巢公司（Nestle SA）销售额上升，原因是雀巢咖啡（Nespresso）和KitKat糖果棒的生产商提高了价格，以应对咖啡和可可成本的上升。【原文：Nestle SA sales rose as the maker of Nespresso and KitKat candy bars increased prices to counter higher costs for coffee and cocoa.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行股票交易在成本上升的情况下飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）今年第一季度的股票交易收入创下历史新高，这家法国贷款机构在全球市场波动的背景下取得了良好的业绩。【原文：BNP Paribas SA reported record income from equities trading as the French lender rode the global market volatility in the first quarter of this year.】

item.title: 在一定程度上，"特朗普之举 "让人眼前一亮
item.description:
关键问题：特朗普在任何时候都在听谁说话，他的精神状态如何？【原文：

Key questions: Who is Trump listening to at any point, and what’s his state of mind?

】

item.title: 联合利华印度公司在需求持续低迷的情况下仍实现了预期利润
item.description: 印度斯坦联合利华有限公司（Hindustan Unilever Ltd.）公布的季度利润符合预期，但由于世界上人口最多的国家的城市居民继续减少家庭消费，导致消费长达一年之久的低迷。【原文：Hindustan Unilever Ltd. posted a quarterly profit that matched estimates, amid a yearlong lull in consumption as city dwellers in the world’s most-populous country continue to cut back their household purchases.】

item.title: 日本资产吸引创纪录资金流入，表明资金正撤离美国
item.description: 日本债券和股票将创下有史以来最大的月度外资流入记录，这进一步表明全球资金正在寻求美国资产的替代品。【原文：Japanese bonds and stocks are set to draw the biggest combined monthly foreign inflows on record, adding to signs global funds are seeking alternatives to US assets.】

item.title: <strong>澳大利亚大选投资者指南</strong
item.description: 不错过任何一集。立即关注 The Bloomberg Australia Podcast。【原文：Never miss an episode. Follow The Bloomberg Australia Podcast today.】

item.title: 日本加藤希望美国谈判以现有外汇协定为基础
item.description: 日本财务大臣表示，他希望在现有货币协议的基础上与美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）举行会谈，此前贝森特曾表示美国不会寻求与日本达成任何具体的货币目标。【原文：Japan’s Finance Minister said that he wants to base upcoming talks with US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on existing agreements on currencies, after Bessent said that the US won’t be seeking any specific currency targets with Japan.】

item.title: 华为在中国发债热潮中融资 27 亿美元，创历史新高
item.description: 华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd.）的母公司正在利用中国信贷市场的低借贷成本筹集创纪录数额的债务，因为与美国的贸易紧张局势促使其转向本地融资。【原文：The parent of Huawei Technologies Co. is tapping low borrowing costs in China’s credit market to raise a record amount of debt, as trade tensions with the US spur a shift toward local financing.】

item.title: 随着需求放缓，中国液化天然气进口量下滑趋势将延续至四月
item.description: 与一年前相比，中国本月的液化天然气进口量将下降 20% 以上，全球最大的液化天然气买家的购买量下滑趋势将进一步扩大。【原文：China’s imports of liquefied natural gas are set to fall by more than 20% this month compared with a year ago, extending a slump in purchases by the world’s biggest buyer of the fuel.】

item.title: 尽管美元反弹，外汇交易员仍坚持看跌美元的押注
item.description: 在美元连续两天反弹之后，外汇交易员们正努力守住看跌美元的头寸。【原文：Foreign exchange traders are battling to hold onto their bearish dollar positions after the currency’s two-day rally.】
